Posts.Content: victoria52 wrote: My sister will be starting chemo on 7/16 and I wanted to pack her a tote bag to take along. I found one at Michael's with clear plastic pockets on the outside to put family pictures in. What would you ladies suggest to pack? Log in to post a reply
